objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Mystery/Detective lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to work and career in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about work and career using expert register
Students create original mystery themed content about work and career in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using expert register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in expert register within mystery theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
